From: ' 
To: ' "  ' 
Subject: 
Fwd: detention memo 
Date: Ilre, 
30 Jun 2020 22:59:04 +0000 
Attachments: 2019-06-29_GM_detention_memo.ebd.docx; ATT00001.htm 
I'll turn to this now— any other comments before it goes up the chain? Thanks. 
Sent from my iPhone 
Begin forwarded message: 
From: ' (USANYS)" 
I 
Date: June 30 2020 at 6:46:24 PM EDT 
To: ' 
Cc: 
Subject: ILL: detention memo 
)" 
Thanks very much, This is persuasive — I read this, and I think we might have a real shot at detention. My 
comments and suggestions in track. Can you take a look, and unless there's stuff to discuss, can you send the next draft 
to the Brass, and feel free to note if you want that it is still rough/in the works, but that in the interests of giving 
everyone a chance to weigh in on the substance, in particular, we wanted to circulate sooner rather than later. 
From: 
<> 
Sent: Tuesday, June 30, 2020 3:48 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: 
Subject: detention memo 
Hi-, 
ca> 
Attached is a draft of the memo — there may be more edits from the team, so I'll incorporate their edits along with 
yours 
later on. Thanks) 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
One Saint Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
EFTA00031850
